HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: zdarma nebo od 69 Kč. Doprava zdarma po celé ČR od 5 000 Kč s DPH.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: 1—2 pracovní dny (v případě objednávky v pracovních dnech do 13:00)

express_delivery.delivery_time: Doručení na čas po Praze: od 120 min (v pracovní dny, v časech dle výběru: 10:00—12:00, 12:00—14:00, 14:00—16:00, 16:00—18:00, 18:00—20:00). Wolt: do 60 min po Praze.
express_delivery.pricing: Doručení na čas po Praze: 99 Kč. Wolt: od 149 Kč.

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: od 69 Kč. Doprava zdarma po celé ČR od 5 000 Kč s DPH.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: od 69 Kč. Doprava zdarma po celé ČR od 5 000 Kč s DPH.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The e-shop offers standard home delivery, parcel shop/locker delivery, and in-store pickup in Prague. Express delivery is available within Prague.
PROVIDERS: Main providers are Messenger and One Courier for home delivery, and Zásilkovna, One Point, and One Box for pickup points and lockers. Wolt is used for express Prague delivery.
PRICING: Standard delivery starts from 69 Kč. In-store pickup is free. Free shipping is offered on all orders over 5,000 Kč. COD surcharge is 49 Kč for pickup points/lockers and 49 Kč or 79 Kč for home delivery.
DELIVERY TIME: Standard home delivery takes 1-2 business days, while parcel point delivery takes 2-3 business days. Express options in Prague deliver within 60-120 minutes.
NOTABLE FEATURES: Extensive express delivery options within Prague (Wolt, timed courier). Express in-store pickup is available for a fee. In-store pickup is available on Saturdays. Age verification with a valid ID is required upon delivery for all orders containing alcohol.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is well-structured and clearly presented in a table on a dedicated 'Doprava a platba' page. It's easy to compare options, pricing, and delivery times. The information is comprehensive and sufficient for customers in the Czech Republic.
